metadata.title: CVE-2021-3404 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In ytnef 1.9.3, the SwapWord function in lib/ytnef.c allows remote attackers to cause a denial-of-service (and potentially code execution) due to a heap buffer overflow which can be triggered via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libytnef package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
